author: Zachary Cohen, Jim Sciutto, Alex Marquardt and Evan Perez, CNN
title: US intelligence agencies started tracking coronavirus outbreak in China as early as November
description: US spy agencies were tracking the rise of the novel coronavirus as early as November, weeks before that information was included in President Donald Trump's daily intelligence briefing, a former US military official told CNN.
content:
(CNN)US spy agencies were tracking the rise of the novel coronavirus as early as November, weeks before that information was included in President Donald Trump's daily intelligence briefing, a former US military official told CNN.
